text: The student will analyze, interpret, and evaluate artwork.
subject: Visual Art
subs: Use critical thinking skills when describing, responding to, interpreting, and evaluating works of art.
Describe ideas and emotions expressed in works of art.
Identify how visual language communicates meaning
Examine the components of an artistâ€™s style, including materials, design, technique, subject matter, and purpose.
Apply personal criteria to evaluate artwork.
